AttackTell.TellText: The attacker shifts their weight, blade drawing back for a measured horizontal cut.

Outcome.ResponseText: You deflect the blade with practiced precision, creating an opening!
Your guard absorbs the disciplined strike.
You evade most of the arc but it clips you.
Bracing does little against the focused cut.
The blade connects with trained precision.

AttackTell.TellText: Dropping into a forward stance, the attacker levels their weapon for a lunging thrust.

Outcome.ResponseText: You sidestep cleanly as the thrust extends past you.
You redirect the thrust, though the force grazes you.
The piercing attack partially bypasses your guard.
Bracing offers no protection against the precise thrust.
The blade finds its mark with surgical accuracy.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker raises their weapon high, muscles coiling for a powerful downward strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You catch the overhead strike solidly, the force dispersing through your guard.
You roll aside as the weapon crashes down.
The weight behind the blow is too much to redirect fully.
You absorb some impact but still stagger.
The crushing blow lands with devastating force.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker drops low, blade sweeping toward your ankles.

Outcome.ResponseText: You hop over the low sweep with perfect timing.
You deflect the sweep downward.
The angle makes a clean parry difficult.
Bracing low helps but you still take the hit.
The sweep takes your legs out from under you.

AttackTell.TellText: With a primal roar, the attacker swings their massive weapon in a devastating arc.

Outcome.ResponseText: You throw yourself clear of the brutal swing.
Your guard holds but your arms go numb from the impact.
The sheer force behind the swing overwhelms your parry.
You hunker down but still get knocked aside.
The savage blow sends you reeling.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker tucks behind their shield, driving forward with their full weight.

Outcome.ResponseText: You pivot aside, leaving them stumbling past!
You plant your feet and absorb the impact, barely.
Shield meets guard in a jarring collision.
There's no blade to parry, only momentum.
The shield slam knocks you back hard.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker spreads their arms wide, lunging to grab you.

Outcome.ResponseText: You slip past the grasping hands!
You knock their arms aside.
Your guard creates distance.
Bracing makes you easier to grab.
Meaty hands seize you in a crushing grip.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker lowers their shoulder and charges like a rampaging bull.

Outcome.ResponseText: You sidestep the charge, leaving them overextended!
You plant your feet and barely hold your ground.
Your guard buckles under the momentum.
There's nothing to parry - only raw force.
The charge tramples you completely.

AttackTell.TellText: Flames coalesce between the caster's hands, forming a searing projectile.

Outcome.ResponseText: You weave aside as the firebolt scorches past.
Your guard disperses some of the flames.
You endure the searing heat.
You can't parry fire.
The firebolt explodes against you.

AttackTell.TellText: Crystalline ice forms in the air, sharpening into deadly shards.

Outcome.ResponseText: You duck as ice shards shatter against the wall behind you.
Your guard deflects the frozen projectiles.
The cold bites deep even through your resistance.
You shatter some shards but others find their mark.
Ice shards pierce and freeze your flesh.

AttackTell.TellText: Static electricity crackles as the caster raises a finger toward you.

Outcome.ResponseText: You move but lightning is faster - it still arcs to you.
You ground yourself, reducing the shock.
Your guard conducts the electricity painfully.
Your weapon becomes a lightning rod.
Lightning courses through your body.

AttackTell.TellText: Motes of purple energy spiral around the caster before streaking toward you.

Outcome.ResponseText: The missiles track you - you evade most but not all.
Your guard absorbs the arcane impacts.
You steel yourself against the magical barrage.
You deflect some missiles but they reform and strike.
The arcane missiles pummel you relentlessly.

AttackTell.TellText: The performer's fingers find a jarring chord, building to an ear-splitting crescendo.

Outcome.ResponseText: You cover your ears and steel your mind.
Your guard does little against sound waves.
You can't dodge sound.
You can't parry a sound wave.
The discordant note pierces your mind.
